original_text: And Abijam slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the city of David. And Asa his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 아비얌이 그의 조상들과 함께 자니 다윗 성에 장사되고 그 아들 아사가 대신하여 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And Abijam slept with his fathers
and they buried him in the city of David.
And Asa his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 아사가 그를 대신하여 왕이 되니라
